subject: Re: [junit] problem with HttpServletRequestSimulator
messageBody:
put it on your classpath...

On Wed, 2003-05-28 at 14:14, Satinder Singh wrote:
> Hi Everybody,
> I am trying to servletunit package by using
> import java.servletunit statement as i have to use HttpServletRequestSimulator class but the compiles is giveing error as
>
> HelloUserTest.java:38: cannot resolve symbol
> symbol : class HttpServletRequestSimulator
> location: class HelloUserTest
> HttpServletRequestSimulator req = new HttpServletRequestSimulator();
>
> so my problem is how to use HttpServletRequestSimulator class.
>
> anybody please suggest me.........
>
>
>
> one more thing I am have a problem wirh servlets when i have to tell the methods with complex parameters as HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse can anybody suggest me the way.....................
>
> Thanks
> Satinder.
